alert.note: Alert for Goshen (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 01 at 3:56PM MDT until July 01 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by the breach of the Interstate Canal. This replaces the Flash Flood Warning. * WHERE...Goshen County in Southeast Wyoming including Lingle. * WHEN...Until 800 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 356 PM MDT, Emergency Management reported the breach in the Interstate Canal has been blocked. Flooding continues in and around Lingle. This replaces the Flash Flood Warning. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lingle. Highway 26 west of Lingle. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
